name: HyperlinkTextDestinations
shortdesc: A collection of hyperlink text destinations.

method.name: add
method.shortdesc: Creates a new hyperlink text destination.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.shortdesc: The text or insertion point location that the hyperlink points to.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new HyperlinkTextDestination

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the HyperlinkTextDestination.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestinations within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The HyperlinkTextDestination, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkTextDestination, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The HyperlinkTextDestination, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkTextDestination, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the HyperlinkTextDestination that follows the desired HyperlinkTextDestination.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination whose index follows the specified HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The HyperlinkTextDestination whose index comes before the desired HyperlinkTextDestination.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every HyperlinkTextDestination in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HyperlinkTextDestination.
Returns the HyperlinkTextDestination with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
